context_of_use: This use case allows users to register, log in, and reset passwords to securely access their accounts.
description: Allow users to register, log in, and reset passwords to securely access their accounts.
triggering_event: User initiates account registration, login, or password reset.
preconditions: User is on the account management interface.
assumptions: User has valid information for registration or password reset.
requirements_met: The system shall allow users to register an account.
The system shall allow users to log in to their accounts.
The system shall allow users to reset their passwords.
main_flow: 1. user registers account → system creates user account and confirms registration.
2. user logs in → system verifies credentials and grants access.
3. user resets password → system verifies identity and updates password.
